sentences.sContent: I had a facelift in 1995, which went wrong.
sentences.sCn: 我在1995年做了一次失败的面部拉皮手术。

synos.tran: 整容手术（除去面部皱纹）

trans.tranCn: 整容手术（除去面部皱纹）
trans.tranOther: if you have a facelift, you have an operation in which doctors remove loose skin from your face in order to make you look younger
